remarks: The set of all constant polynomial matrices over a ring ` R ` is a subring of the ring of all polynomial matrices over the ring ` R ` . (Contributed by AV, 18-Nov-2019.)
statement:
cpmatsrngpmat.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
cpmatsrngpmat.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
cpmatsrngpmat.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
cpmatsrgpmat $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> S e. ( SubRing ` C ) ) $.
